mil4.3:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, navime puggalā mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivaranti na dhārenti.
mil4.3:1.3_0: Rāgacarito dosacarito mohacarito bhīruko āmisagaruko itthī soṇḍo paṇḍako dārako”ti.
mil4.3:2.3_2: rāgavasena mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti,
mil4.3:2.3_4: dosavasena mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti,
mil4.3:2.3_5: mūḷho mohavasena mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti,
mil4.3:2.3_6: bhīruko bhayavasena mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti,
mil4.3:2.3_7: āmisagaruko āmisahetu mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti,
mil4.3:2.3_8: itthī paññāya ittaratāya mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti,
mil4.3:2.3_9: soṇḍiko surālolatāya mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti,
mil4.3:2.3_10: paṇḍako anekaṁsikatāya mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti,
mil4.3:2.3_11: dārako capalatāya mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti.
